choices.answer: An opinion supported by facts available at the time; can change frequently
An opinion supported by  long-held feelings; rarely changes
Short-term causes that occur immediately before an event
Long-term causes that slowly and eventually lead up to an event
An opinion supported by facts available at the time; can change frequently
An opinion supported by  long-held feelings; rarely changes
Problem or challenge that lasts for a short time or only affects few people
Problem or challenge that lasts for many years and/or affects many regions
